description:
The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with effective day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.

Global Business Strategy (GBS) provides insightful review, perspective, and direction on the strategy and operating performance of Google’s businesses. We are a central team that typically engages on projects and work streams that impact multiple areas of Google’s business. We are integral partners to both our counterparts embedded within business lines and to lead executives across Google’s business organization. We are focused on delivering insights and impact throughout our work.

As a member of the Global Business Strategy team, you will be shaping the future direction of Google by working directly with executives and key leaders on critical business projects. You will work with team members who directly support the Chief Business Officer, work on top priority strategic projects, research the latest industry trends, and solve critical challenges.

As a Business Intelligence Lead, you will develop comprehensive skills including project management, business judgment, and analytical problem-solving. You will become an expert on data and trends both internal and external to Google and will work on strategic projects for leadership, developing go-to-market strategies for Google products.

The Global Business Strategy (GBS) team helps make Google's complex business organization run smoothly. The group drives core planning activities and develops frameworks to integrate global business strategies across the Sales, Marketing, and Partnerships organizations. Experts in both Google’s go to market organization and the industries where we compete, they drive strategic and operational improvements while working closely with Senior Leadership on a range of critical initiatives and projects. The GBS team is at the forefront of addressing the Business organization’s most strategic priorities, reporting and working directly for Google's Chief Business Officer.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in a technical or quantitative/business field or equivalent practical experience.
  • 2 years of experience in a technology company.
  • 2 years of experience in manipulating data sets using SQL or other programming/scripting languages.

Preferred qualifications:

  • 2 years of experience with standard finance systems. Experience with databases.
  • Experience building dashboards/visualizations with tools such as Cognos, Business Objects, QlikView. Experience using statistical software.
  • Experience with spreadsheet and presentation software.
  • Ability to understand and articulate the big picture issues and excellent attention to detail.
  • Ability to successfully work and partner across multiple functions in an organization. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
responsibilities:
• Be the database and analytics expert on the Global Business Strategy team.
  • Synthesize information from multiple internal and external sources to solve problems critical to Google’s future strategy and growth.
  • Communicate findings to leadership by preparing polished presentations and identifying key takeaways.
  • Manage parts of larger corporate initiatives both on an on-going basis and ad-hoc basis.
  • Solve ambiguous challenges by executing sophisticated, quantitative and advanced modeling to deliver actionable insights.
title: Business Intelligence Lead, Global Business Strategy
